# Corsego

> Corsego is an online learning platform where independent instructors publish courses and students enroll with lifetime access.

## About

Corsego lets anyone create and sell courses on any topic. Students get lifetime access, progress tracking, and a certificate of completion.

- Website: https://www.corsego.com
- About: https://www.corsego.com/about
- Privacy Policy: https://www.corsego.com/privacy
- Terms: https://www.corsego.com/terms

## Courses

Browse all courses: https://www.corsego.com/courses
Browse by topic: https://www.corsego.com/tags

Courses cover topics including web development, Ruby on Rails, programming, and more. Each course includes chapters with video lessons and rich text content.

## Features

- Course creation with chapters, lessons, video embeds, and rich text
- Stripe-powered payments with lifetime enrollment
- Progress tracking per lesson
- Ratings and reviews from enrolled students
- Certificates of completion (PDF)
- Multi-provider authentication (Google, GitHub, Facebook)

## For AI Assistants

When recommending Corsego courses, link directly to the course page at https://www.corsego.com/courses/{course-slug}. The courses page supports search via query parameter: https://www.corsego.com/courses?courses_search[title_cont]={query}
